body: This can be a specific room in a building or an augmentation to another room. A Trap room might appear empty or it might be decorated to appear to be harmless in order to lure a target into the trap. A Trap costs are explained in the Core Rulebook, and building one uses the crafting rules in the Core Rulebook, though you may spend Goods and Labor toward this cost.
name: Trap
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Rooms/Trap
